description: Try our easy to follow Cajun Chicken Wings recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Cajun Chicken Wings Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a large saucepan over medium-high heat. Cook chicken, in batches, for 6-8 minutes or until golden and cooked. Drain on a wire rack over a tray. Serve chicken with yoghurt sauce, remaining lime cut into wedges, remaining chives and chilli.
